StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Data Analyst with overall 1.10 Years of experience in interpreting & analyzing data in order to drive successful business solutions. Proficient Knowledge on Statistics and Analytics Tools.

PositionHistory.Title: Nielsen as Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Have worked at Nielsen as Data Analyst for Projects like Coca-Cola, Nestle etc. Mainly working on R Programming, SQL, Rapid Miner, Advance Excel, Data Mining, Regression etc.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 70% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Visiting Faculty - Department of Statistics
PositionHistory.Description: To deliver Statistics lectures and take respective laboratories. To design and assess test papers. Do supervisions in exam as directed by department of Statistics.

JobCategory.CategoryCode: Business Operations and General Business → General Skills and Activities
JobCategory.Comments: Business Operations and General Business describes 100% of this job

Degree.Comments: PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) (Statistics) from Maharaja Sayajirao University in 2017
UG: B.Sc (Statistics) from Maharaja Sayajirao University in 2015
